tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "24.2.1 Dispute resolution and arbitration You and Spotify agree that any dispute, claim, or controversy between you and Spotify arising in connection with or relating in any way to these Agreements or to your relationship with Spotify as a user of the Service (whether based in contract, tort, statute, fraud, misrepresentation, or any other legal theory, and whether the claims arise during or after the termination of the Agreements) will be determined by mandatory binding individual (not class) arbitration."
tosdr.case: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
